description: This table enables you to report on medications ordered. This table should be used with ORDER_MED.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the medication order record.

columns.name: AUTH_SER_ADDRESS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the address of the order's authorizing provider. It is used to identify an address using the address unique ID (I SER 21000) stored in the provider record.

columns.name: ORDER_SER_ADDR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the address of the order's ordering provider. It is used to identify an address using the address unique ID (I SER 21000) stored in the provider record.

columns.name: SUP_SER_ADDRESS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the address of the order's supervising provider. It is used to identify an address using the address unique ID (I SER 21000) stored in the provider record.

columns.name: TEMP_LONG_TERM_IN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the temporary long-term indicator for unsigned orders.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes in MDL


No in MDL


Yes Unsigned


No Unsigned

columns.name: PRIORITIZED_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the prioritized instant (date and time) for an order in UTC time zone. It represents the most relevant date and time an action was taken on an order.

columns.name: PRIORITIZED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the prioritized instant (date and time) for an order in local time zone. It represents the most relevant date and time an action was taken on an order.

columns.name: NEXT_SCH_INST_AT_DISCON_DTTM
columns.description: The next scheduled date and time for the order at the time of discontinue.

columns.name: NEXT_SCH_AT_DISCON_OFF_SCH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the next scheduled time of the order at the time of discontinue is off-schedule. 'Y' indicates that the next scheduled time was off-schedule. 'N' or NULL indicate that the next scheduled time was not off-schedule.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ORD_SIG_HAS_IOU_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether Indications of Use are present in the patient sig. 'Y' indicates Indications of Use are present in the patient sig. 'N' or NULL indicate that Indications of Use are not present in the patient sig.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NEXT_SCH_AT_DISCON_OFF_SCH_YN

columns.name: MED_DIRECTIONS_LONG
columns.description: Contains the directions for taking a medication order.

columns.name: USER_CHANGED_END_TIME_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the end time is entered by a user. This is only populated for unsigned medication orders. 'Y' indicates the end time is entered by a user. 'N' or NULL indicate that the end time is not entered by a user.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ORIG_MED_DIRECTIONS_LONG
columns.description: Contains the original directions for taking a medication order.

columns.name: NO_REIMBURS_CODESET
columns.description: Holds the code set of the selected reimbursement code.

columns.name: STANDING_COUNT
columns.description: This item stores a numeric value for the count of the order that goes along with the standing count type, indicating the number of hours, days, weeks, or occurrences for which the order will take place.

columns.name: STANDING_COUNT_TP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This count type goes along with the count from ORD-34040 to indicate the number of hours, days, weeks, or occurrences for which the order will take place.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Days


Weeks


Hours


Occurrences
